name: 7.5 "Those Lips, Those Ice" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 7 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who cried in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Rebecca asked Woody not to let anyone disturb her because she had a lot of work to do. Woody kept interrupting her until she finally yelled at him. He came back into the office crying and saying "I'm sorry, Miss Howe".

questions.text: What did Frasier have in his briefcase?
questions.explanation:
a phone.

	Frasier was quite proud of his new briefcase phone. Woody called his mother from the phone.

questions.text: What game did Woody have tickets to?
questions.explanation:
Patriots-Dolphins.

	Woody had 2 tickets so the others fought over who would go with him. They ended up having a race to the corner and back.

options: a picture of Mickey Mouse from Florida
an ankle bracelet from New Jersey
questions.explanation:
a wrist bracelet from Wisconsin.

	On the bracelet was a beer stein, a bowl of sauerkraut and Pete Rose's head. Carla told him "It better not turn my skin green".

questions.text: Who came to the bar that everyone wanted to meet?
questions.explanation:
Franzi Schrempf.

	Franzi was played by Isa Jank. At the time of the show she went by the name Isa Anderson. She was born in Germany in 1952.

questions.text: Who won the race to the corner?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	Norm won the race but being out of shape he was exhausted just from running to the corner. Woody ended up leaving without him because he didn't want to miss the start of the game and Norm was too tired out to move.

questions.text: Who got turned down repeatedly by the famous person who came to the bar?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Sam tried everything he could to get a date with Franzi, but he did not succeed. Sam at one point made a comment that she was "sexy, dumb and a cheap date".

questions.text: Who was upset that Sam considered becoming a communist?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	Sam asked about how hard it was to become a communist because Frasier made a comment that Franzi was one. Sam not being very smart, thought that being a communist was like joining some sort of a club.

questions.text: Why did Carla beat up Eddie?
questions.correct: She thought he was cheating on her.
options: She was told to by a higher power.
She thought that he insulted her.
She found out he was really a woman.
questions.explanation:
She thought he was cheating on her.

	Carla later decided to be really nice to Eddie and Eddie ate it up. He didn't know why and eventually it started to bother him. When she found out that he wasn't cheating on him she got upset that he let her act like she was for no reason.

questions.text: Why did Eddie think Carla was being nice to him?
questions.correct: He thought she was pregnant again and this was her way of telling him.
options: He thought she spent too much money.
He thought she lost her job at Cheers.
He thought she had just become a changed woman.
questions.explanation:
He thought she was pregnant again and this was her way of telling him.

	Carla told him that there was dishes that needed to be done. At first, Eddie was shocked by the order, but then smiled and said "that's my girl."
